___utils_reference_json.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized

id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

website.description: The website which the referenced id belongs to. Currently supported only for sections.

___utils_reference_json.title: Representation of a normalized element

___utils_section_json.description: A hierarchical section in a taxonomy. In the Arc ecosystem, these are stored in the arc-site-service.

description.description: A short description or tagline about this site

parent.description: The id of this section's parent section in various commonly-used hierarchies, where available.

parent_id.description: The id of this section's parent section in the default hierarchy, if any.

path.description: The url path to this site

___utils_section_json.title: Section

trait_additional_properties_json.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
trait_additional_properties_json.title: Has additional properties

trait_alignment_json.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
trait_alignment_json.title: Alignment

trait_channel_json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
trait_channel_json.title: Channel trait

trait_id_json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
trait_id_json.title: Globally Unique ID trait

trait_subtype_json.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.
trait_subtype_json.title: Subtype or Template

trait_version_json.description: The version of ANS that this object was serialized as, in major.minor.patch format.  For top-level content objects, this is a required trait.
trait_version_json.title: Describes the ANS version of this object

trait_website_json.description: The _id of the website on which this document exists. This field is only available in Content API. If different from canonical_website, then this document was originally sourced from the canonical_website. Generated at fetch time by Content API.
trait_website_json.title: Website

trait_website_url_json.description: The relative URL to this document on the website specified by the `website` field. In a multi-site context, this is the url that is typically queried on when fetching by URL. It may be different than canonical_url. Generated at fetch time by Content API.
trait_website_url_json.title: Website URL

description: Website-specific  metadata for url generation for multi-site copies. These fields are not indexed in Content API.
title: Websites Input
